name: Masked HERO
author: Limitless95
notes:
Played Geargias because of the people here who were the first to climb to KoG but had a rough time until I switched to the real heroes. I was at legend 2 with 34 wins before switching to Heroes, but but but.. 10 easy win streak to KoG.

Trap Hole saved me twice, and no Malicious because I hate bricking and most duels end within 3~4 turns.
